## Remarks 此构造函数将生成以下默认属性值：This constructor results in the following default property values: |propertiesProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.1 (SHA-256) 2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.1 (SHA-256)| || 如果 为 ， if is ,

本来 otherwise| 对于输入，不检查参数指定的签名证书是否 `certificate` 有效。The signing certificate specified by the `certificate` parameter is not checked for validity on input. 若要在向此构造函数提供证书之前验证证书，请使用 方法。To validate the certificate prior to supplying it to this constructor, use the method. 此构造函数不验证参数是否 `privateKey` 与中的公钥相对应 `certificate` 。This constructor does not validate that the `privateKey` parameter corresponds to the public key in `certificate`. 如果键不匹配， 类和方法将 在签名过程中引发。If the keys don't match, the class and method throw a during the signing process.

summary.span: 获取与此签名关联且受该签名保护的特性集合。

span.span: Gets a collections of attributes to associate with this signature that are also protected by the signature.

value.span: 与此签名关联的属性集合，这些属性也受签名保护。

span.span: A collections of attributes to associate with this signature that are also protected by the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在属性检索的集合中包含的已签名特性的一个示例 是 签名时间特性。An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is the signing time attribute. 当 属性不为空时，将自动生成对象和对象并将其放置在相应签名者的属性中。A object and a object will be automatically generated and placed in the property for the corresponding signer whenever the property is not empty.

summary.span: 获取与此签名关联但不受该签名保护的特性集合。

span.span: Gets a collections of attributes to associate with this signature that are not protected by the signature.

value.span: 与此签名关联的、不受签名保护的特性集合。

span.span: A collections of attributes to associate with this signature that are not protected by the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能包含在由属性检索的集合中的未签名特性的一个示例 是副署。An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is a countersignature.
